comment.body:
> [poubelle](#comment_1_1iKwsLs3AWyou1MY2jCTXn7Mc6L1VDiCL):

> It is not peaceful.

Notice how you are the only one who makes personal insults.

> You are not enjoying it.

I don't know if you enjoy this discussion. You might or might not enjoy it, others might not or might not enjoy it, but I do. I do enjoy this discussion.

> This is the worst excuse of a blog I have ever seen in my whole life.

Why do you keep making such insults?

> [poubelle](#comment_2_1iKwsLs3AWyou1MY2jCTXn7Mc6L1VDiCL):

â€¦

> Is this the best you can do impersonating a SJW again? Why would I stop insulting you when you enjoy it so much?

I enjoy the discussion, not the insults. They are unwarranted.
